named-query.name: CARTITEM_DELETE_BY_SKU_GUID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShoppingItemImpl ci WHERE ci.skuGuid = ?1

named-query.name: DELETE_CARTITEMS_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShoppingItemImpl ci WHERE ci.guid IN (:list)

named-query.name: SHOPPING_ITEM_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT si FROM ShoppingItemImpl si WHERE si.guid = ?1

named-query.name: SHOPPING_CART_FIND_BY_GUID_EAGER
named-query.query: SELECT sc FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid = ?1

named-query.name: DEFAULT_SHOPPING_CART_FIND_BY_SHOPPER_UID
named-query.query: SELECT sc FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.shopperUid = ?1 AND sc.status = 'ACTIVE' AND sc.default = true

named-query.name: DEFAULT_SHOPPING_CARTGUID_FIND_BY_SHOPPER_UID
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.shopperUid = ?1 AND sc.status = 'ACTIVE' AND sc.default = true

named-query.name: STORE_BY_CARTGUID
named-query.query: SELECT sc.storeCode FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid = ?1

named-query.name: ACTIVE_SHOPPING_CART_GUID_FIND_BY_CUSTOMER_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc, ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE sc.shopperUid = s.uidPk AND s.customer.guid = ?1 AND s.account is null AND sc.status = 'ACTIVE' AND UPPER(s.storeCode) = UPPER(?2)

named-query.name: ACTIVE_SHOPPING_CART_GUID_FIND_BY_CUSTOMER_AND_ACCOUNT_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc, ShopperMementoImpl s WHERE sc.shopperUid = s.uidPk AND s.customer.guid = ?1 AND s.account.sharedId = ?2 AND sc.status = 'ACTIVE' AND UPPER(s.storeCode) = UPPER(?3)

named-query.name: DELETE_SHOPPING_CART_BY_GUIDS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid IN (:list)

named-query.name: FIND_SHOPPING_CART_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: SELECT sc.lastModifiedDate FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid= ?1

named-query.name: FIND_GUID_OF_SHOPPING_CART_WITH_MATCHING_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid = ?1

named-query.name: FIND_GUID_OF_SHOPPING_CART_WITH_MATCHING_GUID_AND_STORE_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.guid = ?1 AND UPPER(sc.storeCode) = UPPER(?2)

named-query.name: FIND_CART_DATA_FOR_CARTS
named-query.query: SELECT sc.guid, cartData FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc INNER JOIN sc.cartData cartData WHERE sc.guid IN (:list)

named-query.name: WISHLIST_BY_SHOPPING_CONTEXT
named-query.query: SELECT wl FROM WishListImpl wl WHERE wl.shopperUid = ?1

named-query.name: WISHLIST_BY_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT wl FROM WishListImpl wl WHERE wl.guid = ?1

named-query.name: WISHLIST_BY_SKU_GUID
named-query.query: SELECT wl FROM WishListImpl wl, IN (wl.allItems) item WHERE item.skuGuid = ?1

named-query.name: CART_ITEMS_BY_CART_UID
named-query.query: SELECT item FROM ShoppingItemImpl item WHERE item.childItemCartUid = ?1

named-query.name: DISABLE_PARENT_CHILD_CART_ITEM_RELATION_BY_SHOPPER_UID
named-query.query: UPDATE ShoppingItemImpl si SET si.parentItemUid = null WHERE si.childItemCartUid = (select cart.uidPk from ShoppingCartMementoImpl cart where cart.shopperUid = ?1 and cart.status = 'ACTIVE')

named-query.name: DELETE_SHOPPING_CARTS_BY_SHOPPER_UID
named-query.query: DELETE FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl sc WHERE sc.shopperUid = ?1
